mapper.select: select wii.id as id, wii.ins_name as insName, wii.ins_specifications as insSpecifications, wii.ins_cost as insCost, wii.ins_pricing as insPricing, wii.ins_manufacturers as insManufacturers, wp.parts_name as insParts, wii.ins_remake as insRemake from w_instrument_information wii left join w_parts wp on wp.id=wii.ins_parts where wii.id=#{ids2}
mapper.update: update w_instrument_information set ins_name =#{insName}, ins_specifications=#{insSpecifications}, ins_cost =#{insCost}, ins_pricing =#{insPricing}, ins_manufacturers =#{insManufacturers}, ins_remake =#{insRemake}, ins_time=now() where id=#{id}
